project-scaffold.name: Project Scaffold
project-scaffold.description: This epic establishes the plugin project structure, configuration files, and base architecture

agent-definitions.name: Agent Definitions
agent-definitions.description: This epic defines and implements the explore, plan, and implement agents with their prompts and behaviors

workflow-orchestration.name: Workflow Orchestration
workflow-orchestration.description: This epic implements the gate enforcement and routing logic that ensures proper workflow progression
ac: PRD gate prevents exploration without requirements
Plan gate prevents implementation without plan
Routing directs to correct agent based on phase

state-management.name: State Management
state-management.description: This epic implements the state.json read/write operations and sync mechanisms
ac: State file is read and parsed correctly
State stays in sync with actual project

commands-and-skills.name: Commands and Skills
commands-and-skills.description: This epic implements the user-facing commands and skills for interacting with the workflow
